text: Liaoning University of Petroleum and Chemical Technology () is a university in Fushun, Liaoning, People's Republic of China under the provincial government. It was founded in 1950 at Dalian as the first petroleum and chemical technology university of People's Republic of China. In 1953, it moved to Fushun. More than 60,000 students graduated, most of whom have become managers and core technicians in Chinese petroleum and related companies. There are 13 academicians of Chinese Academy of Science and Chinese Academy of Engineering. Its engineering is relatively strong in China, especially in petroleum related areas. ==External links== *Liaoning University of Petroleum and Chemical Technology official site Category:Universities and colleges in Liaoning Category:Petroleum engineering schools
title: Liaoning University of Petroleum and Chemical Technology
